personal-info.title: PERSONAL INFORMATION
personal-info.subtitle: TO BE PART OF THE SEEDS PROGRAM, ENTER THE NEEDED INFORMATION
personal-info.fieldNameHint: Can enter more than one name
personal-info.fieldLastNameHint: Can enter more than one lastname
personal-info.fieldLastNameError: You must enter the last name
personal-info.fieldPhoneError: You must enter a cell phone
personal-info.contributionTypeBanner: CHOOSE THE CONTRIBUTION YOU WANT TO REALISE

contribution-details.detail-unique-contribution: It consists of making a contribution of more than $25 or its equivalent of 175 Bs. You can choose the payment method of your choice and the current day in which you will make your contribution. Likewise, if you want to receive news about the latest achievements of the Seeds Program thanks to the contributions obtained.
contribution-details.detail-constant-contribution: It consists of making a monthly contribution of more than $5 for feeding a child or its equivalent of 35 Bs. You can choose the month in which you want to start the contribution process (You can only choose 3 months from the current month). You can choose the payment method of your choice, the collection date on which your contribution is expected, the means by which you want to receive your monthly contribution reminder. Likewise, if would like to receive news of the latest achievements of the Semillas Program thanks to the contributions obtained.
contribution-details.detail-enterprise-contribution: It consists of making a monthly contribution of more than $5 for feeding a child or its equivalent of 35 Bs. You can choose the month in which you want to start the contribution process (You can only choose 3 months from the current month). You can choose the payment method of your choice, the collection date on which your contribution is expected, the means by which you want to receive your monthly contribution reminder. Likewise, if would like to receive news of the latest achievements of the Semillas Program thanks to the contributions obtained.

unique-contribution.label-contribution-amount-error: You must enter the amount of contribution
unique-contribution.label-payment-method-error: You must choose the payment method
unique-contribution.label-receive-news: Would you like to receive news ?

constant-contribution.label-contribution-amount-error: You must enter the contribution amount
constant-contribution.label-payment-method-error: You must choose the payment method
constant-contribution.label-begin-month-error: You must choose the month in which the contribution cycle will begin
constant-contribution.label-contribution-day-error: You must choose the day of the month on which you will make your contribution
constant-contribution.label-reminder-method-error: You must choose a method to receive reminders
constant-contribution.label-receive-news: Would you like to receive news ?

send-data.confirmation-question: Are you sure to send your data?

dolares-en-alimento.title-pregunta: HOW DOES 5 DOLLARS TURN INTO FOOD?
dolares-en-alimento.texto-1: All the funds raised by the Seed Program have the exclusive objective of optimizing the work of the Institution through the purchase of:
dolares-en-alimento.texto-alimneto-duradero: Durable food or food not usual in donations
dolares-en-alimento.texto-combustible-gasto: Fuel and other logistics expenses that involve the transfer of food

eres-voluntario.texto-voluntario: If you are a volunteer, please Login with the credentials provided by the Seeds Program
